amendment.description: To exclude Petroleum Administration for Defense Districts I, IV, and V from the renewable fuel program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 853 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 26 - 69. Record Vote Number: 207.

action.text: Amendment SA 853 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 850. (consideration: CR S7372-7373; text: CR S7372) To exclude Petroleum Administration for Defense Districts I, IV, and V from the renewable fuel program.
